mapper.select: select id, source_type, source_id, target_type, target_id, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time from ai_client_config where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ai_client_config(source_type, source_id, target_type, target_id, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{sourceType}, #{sourceId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{extParam}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into ai_client_config(source_type, source_id, target_type, target_id, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.sourceType}, #{entity.sourceId}, #{entity.targetType}, #{entity.targetId}, #{entity.extParam}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into ai_client_config(source_type, source_id, target_type, target_id, ext_param, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.sourceType}, #{entity.sourceId}, #{entity.targetType}, #{entity.targetId}, #{entity.extParam}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update source_type = values(source_type), source_id = values(source_id), target_type = values(target_type), target_id = values(target_id), ext_param = values(ext_param), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update ai_client_config
source_type = #{sourceType},
source_id = #{sourceId},
target_type = #{targetType},
target_id = #{targetId},
ext_param = #{extParam},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
